name: Super-Easy Sausage and Peppers
author: Michele Novellano League
summary: A simple and delicious way to serve sausage and peppers with a tomato-based sauce. This is one of my husband's and kids' favorite meals. They like it served over rice because it makes a lot of 'gravy' that soaks into the rice. It 's one of my favorites because it's quick, easy, and has only a few ingredients that I usually have on hand.
ingredients: 7  sweet Italian sausages, or more to taste, removed from the casings and cut into bite-size pieces
1 tablespoon olive oil, or more to taste
1 large sweet onion, halved and sliced
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Spread sausage pieces into a baking dish
Bake sausage in preheated oven until heated through, about 20 minutes
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Saute onion in oil until translucent, 5 to 7 minutes
Pour tomato sauce over the sausage mixture; bring to a simmer and cook for 20 minutes
Stir bell pepper into the mixture to coat in tomato sauce; cook until the bell pepper is tender, about 20 minutes more
